Name: Navigate and Verify Home Page from Search
Description: Access the search page, view more results, and click on a specific request to navigate to the home page. Verify that the home page is displayed.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /search with params (gs lcrp, ie, oq, q, rlz, sourceid)
Step 2: Click on span showMore
Step 3: Click on span grantGmxmlhttpRequest
Step 4: Click on span grantGmxmlhttpRequest -> Navigate to page ''
Step 5: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Access Server Options from Configuration Menu
Description: Navigate to the configuration page, access server options from the menu, and return to the home page to verify successful navigation.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /config
Step 2: Click on button menu
Step 3: Click on link serverOptions -> Navigate to page '/config/server-options'
Step 4: Click on header serverOptions -> Navigate to page ''
Step 5: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Search and Browse Latest Content from Home Page

Step 11: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Navigate and Purchase Accessories from K Cellphone Shop
Description: Start at the product page, navigate through the K Cellphone Shop, add accessories to the cart, adjust quantities, and proceed to checkout. Verify navigation and page transitions.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /product/*
Step 2: Click on main product
Step 3: Click on link kCellphoneShop -> Navigate to page '/'
Step 4: Click on div kCellphoneShop
Step 5: Click on div kCellphoneShop
Step 6: Click on link kCellphoneShopLogo
Step 7: Click on button hamburgerMenu
Step 8: Click on link accessories
Step 9: Click on link apple -> Navigate to page '/category/accessories-apple'
Step 10: Click on button addToCart
Step 11: Click on link placeOrder -> Navigate to page '/cart'
Step 12: Click on div quantity
Step 13: Click on button increaseQuantity
Step 14: Click on button proceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page '/checkout/info'
Step 15: Click on div logoWrapper
Step 16: Click on link backToCart -> Navigate to page '/cart'
Step 17: Click on link accessoriesFooter -> Navigate to page ''
Step 18: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
